{
    "number": 124264,
    "data": "2,5,20,51,312,740,15000,34125,160720,4988592,180774720,844074000,27991656000,66264953040",
    "name": "Hilbert-Warren Add Sequence.",
    "comment": [
        "Variant of A124261."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "Terms generated by solving n x n linear system [H']x = b where b is unity and elements of H' are given by H'[i,j] = (i + j)/(i + j - 1). Sequence term is the denominator of last unknown xn. Numerator is unity for last term for all problem orders examined."
    ],
    "program": [
        "/* [wxMaxima: input start ] */ load(\"eigen\"); order : 4; X : columnvector(makelist(concat(x,i), i, 1, order)); h[i,j] := (i + j)/(i + j - 1); Unity[i,j] := 1; A : genmatrix(h, order, order); A . X; B : genmatrix(Unity, 1, order); A . X = B; Ap : triangularize(A); Ap . X = B; App : invert(Ap); App . B; /* [wxMaxima: input end ] */"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A124261."
    ],
    "keyword": "eigen,frac,hard,nonn",
    "offset": "1,1",
    "author": "L. Van Warren (van(AT)wdv.com), Oct 23 2006",
    "ext": [
        "The author said that this version of the submission was unsatisfactory and set me a better version in email, which may replace this. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 24 2006"
    ],
    "references": 0,
    "revision": 3,
    "time": "2012-03-30T16:50:35-04:00",
    "created": "2006-12-06T03:00:00-05:00"
}
